settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
• No brush needed
  • No glue needed
  • No cutters needed
  • Genuine license
  • Parts painted with new base
  • Glow with rich movable joints
  • Classic animation scenes restored

Unveil Transformers Shining Version 01: Six unique figures plus a secret character, featuring upgraded glow-in-the-dark elements and 20+ articulation points. Each surprise box may contain rare finds like Acid Storm or Special Megatron.

Perfect for collectors 10+, these limited edition figures bring vibrant detail to any Transformers collection.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules: 

1. For individuals aged 10 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 10 are not advised to make purchases. 

2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys. 

3. Suprise products are unique and random; once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Surprise Contains:

  • Transformers Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Energon Cube x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series Composition: 6 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one secret figure).

settings.block_text: Each figure is officially licensed, ensuring authenticity and quality. You’re getting a true piece of the Transformers legacy.
The series includes six distinct figurines, and with a chance to uncover a secret character. Each box is the same, making it a surprise and adding excitement to every unboxing.
The figures are adorned with radium carving on the chest and meticulous paint details. Each character is rendered with precision, showcasing stunning craftsmanship.
The Shining Version 01 features upgraded luminous mechanisms with special lighting effects and exclusive fluorescent  UV-reactive materials, enhancing the overall visual impact.

settings.heading: Shining Roll out: TheBattle llluminated
settings.context: Step into the glow with Blokees Transformers Shining Version 01.

settings.block_title: What sets Shining Roll Out apart from other Transformers figures?
settings.block_text: Shining Roll Out is distinguished by its advanced luminous effects, including glowing features, which provide a stunning visual experience. These figures also feature 20+ points of articulation for dynamic posing and come with exclusive characters and premium details, making them highly desirable for collectors.

settings.block_title: Are the materials used in Shining Roll Out safe for children?
settings.block_text: Yes, the figures in Shining Roll Out are made from high-quality, non-toxic materials that meet stringent safety standards. They are designed to be both durable and safe, ensuring peace of mind for parents.

settings.block_title: What is included in each Shining Roll Out package?
settings.block_text: Each package includes a single figure, a themed base, two plate joints, one plate hand type, a collector's card, and an energon cube. The figures are pre-painted and require no additional tools such as brushes, glue, or cutters for assembly. Detailed instructions are also provided for easy setup.

settings.block_title: How rare are the secret figures and exclusive characters in the Shining Roll Out?
settings.block_text: The Megatron Secret Figure is particularly rare, with a ratio of 1 in 36 boxes. Other exclusive characters like Acid Storm are available at a ratio of 1 in 6, adding an exciting element of surprise and rarity to the collection and making it a thrilling hunt for collectors.

settings.block_title: Are these figures suitable for both play and display?
settings.block_text: Absolutely! Shining Roll Out figures are designed with high articulation, making them perfect for dynamic play. Their detailed paintwork and exclusive luminous effects also make them ideal for display. The themed bases enhance the overall presentation, making them perfect for showcasing.

Yes, Shining Roll Out is officially licensed. Each figure is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring genuine designs that faithfully restore classic animation scenes. The high-quality paint and metal finishes ensure that the figures are both authentic and durable.

settings.block_title: How do the luminous effects work on these figures?
settings.block_text:
The luminous effects on Shining Roll Out figures are achieved through special glowing mechanisms integrated into the body.
These features are activated in two different ways: one by shaking the chest lamp to make it glow, and the other by exposing the figure to UV light in a dim environment, which causes it to illuminate. These dual lighting mechanisms create a stunning visual effect that enhances the overall appearance of the figures.

settings.block_title: What age range is Shining Roll Out series suitable for?
settings.block_text: Shining Roll Out is recommended for children aged 10 and up. The figures offer a blend of fun and creativity, providing an enjoyable and slightly challenging experience that is perfect for growing minds.

settings.block_title: How do I assemble Shining Roll Out figures?
settings.block_text: Assembling Shining Roll Out figures is simple and straightforward. The pre-painted ABS pieces snap together easily, following the included instructions. There is no need for additional tools such as glue, brushes, or cutters, making the assembly process quick and enjoyable.

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
